email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, available for this route. She’s a 150,000 DWT tanker with an LOA of 280 meters. The starting freight rate we’re quoting is in the low 50s ($50.50 per ton). Let me know your thoughts and if you’d like to proceed. Best regards, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were expecting. Would you be able to come down to the mid-40s? Also, could you confirm the laycan dates? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your concerns about the rate. After discussing with the owner, we can offer a revised rate of $48.75 per ton. The laycan is currently set for October 20-25. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised rate. We’re almost there—could you do $48.00 per ton? Also, can you confirm the demurrage terms? We’d like to finalize this soon. Best, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I’ve managed to secure $48.00 per ton for you. The demurrage rate is $20,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this is acceptable, and I’ll draft the charter party agreement. Best regards, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, that works for us. Please proceed with drafting the agreement. We’ll need it by end of day tomorrow. Thanks for your help on this. Cheers, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear. I’ll have the charter party agreement ready for review by tomorrow morning. Thanks for your patience, and let me know if you need anything else in the meantime. Best, Sarah.
